channel.title: Blogs on GOTM
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on GOTM

item.title: GOTM release - v5.2
item.description: Version 5.2 of GOTM is ready for release. It comes relative shortly after the release of version 5.0. One of the policies for a new release are changes in configuration files - releated to the new features.

item.title: GOTM Roadmap - as of end of 2017
item.description: Below we will give a short description of the planned developments in the next 1 to 2 years. These plans do not in any way exclude other developments but only list what we have planned or have already started (likely because of project deliverables).

item.title: Updated Windows NetCDF libraries
item.description:
Mainly for developers.

Updated NetCDF libraries for Windows. Still 3.6.3 but now both 32 and 64 bit are supported.

item.title: GOTM release - v5.0
item.description: Finally the version 5 of GOTM is ready for release. It comes with a very large number of changes and improvements. Some - but not all - are mention in the list below.
